data.text: @boriskarkov Alright fair. Honestly I’m just exhausted from the last two years of hearing, “Why don’t you just [insert fun thing I would love to do if not for having immunocompromised loved ones]?” Sorry for lashing out.

@marshallnotpass my cheeky, not-really-that-serious post about wss’s box office performance wasn’t meant to scold anyone; i’m just trying to have some fun on the computer tbh. meanwhile you’re on here scolding people you don’t know for no discernible reason — sounds miserable to me but you do you
@marshallnotpass @boriskarkov If you still have them on the phone, will you ask them if I can have a part in the new Bullitt movie?
@boriskarkov Just got a call from Spielberg’s team — they want to thank you for scolding fans who tanked the box office by prioritizing their health. Apparently your gift basket is in the mail! 🙌🙌🙌
@boriskarkov The six senior citizens in the cinema aren't that dangerous imo
@boriskarkov All real diehard Peter Bergheads upset with your usage of the term.
@boriskarkov I went to see Spider-Man and Encanto instead of West Side Story because of covid
